mapper.select: SELECT collect.id, collect.goods_id, goods.shop_name, goods.cost_price, goods.pic, goods.status, goods.goods_unit, goods.abstracts, goods.stock FROM user_goods_collect collect JOIN shop_goods goods ON collect.goods_id = goods.id WHERE collect.collect_user_info_id = #{id} AND collect.user_del = 1 ORDER BY collect.id DESC
